wikipedia_page.main: Major General Francis Hope Grant Hutchinson CIE (1870–1931) was a senior British physician and Surgeon to the King.

response: Francis Hutchinson (1660–1739) was Bishop of Down and Connor and opponent of witch-hunting.
Francis Hutchinson may also refer to:
*Francis Hutchinson, co-founding member in the 1820s of a group that became the Plymouth Brethren, see John Nelson Darby
